news.title: What's behind France's political crisis and what could happen next?
news.summary: France's prime minister has lost a confidence vote, sending parliament into another period of chaos and uncertainty.

news.title: UK could suspend visas for countries with no migrant return deals, new home secretary says
news.summary: Shabana Mahmood, who was appointed in last week's reshuffle, says her top priority is to 'secure' the UK's borders.

news.title: How a shoot-out ended a four-year search for a NZ bushman and his three children
news.summary: After a handful of chance encounters and brief sightings, the fugitive was shot dead on Monday morning.

news.title: Prince Harry back in the UK and attends charity awards
news.summary: Prince Harry marked the anniversary of the death of the late Queen privately in Windsor.

news.title: New MasterChef hosts revealed after Wallace and Torode axed
news.summary: Gregg Wallace and John Torode were sacked after an inquiry into conduct on the BBC show.

news.title: Six killed by Palestinian gunmen at Jerusalem bus stop
news.summary: Israeli police say two gunmen were killed after the attack, which was one of the deadliest in the city in years.

news.title: New Banksy mural appears at Royal Courts of Justice
news.summary: The artwork, which shows a judge hitting a protester with a gavel, was confirmed by the elusive street artist.

news.title: Great North Run medals show wrong city and river
news.summary: Medals given to participants use an image of Sunderland, which has no connection to the event.

news.title: Trump asks Supreme Court to allow billions in foreign aid cuts
news.summary: The administration is seeking an emergency order as it tries to claw back funds allocated by Congress.

news.title: How does Carlos Alcaraz rank against other tennis legends?
news.summary: After his sixth Grand Slam triumph, BBC Sport compares his stunning record with the biggest legends in the men's game.
